text: Rune Ottesen (born 7 February 1954) is a former Norwegian footballer who played as a midfielder for Vard Haugesund and Bryne. He won seventeen caps for Norway between 1975 and 1981 and scored one goal, in a 2–1 win over Sweden in 1977.Norwegian Federation website ==References== Category:Norwegian footballers Category:1954 births Category:Norway international footballers Category:SK Vard Haugesund players Category:Bryne FK players Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders
title: Rune Ottesen
